#!/bin/bash

menu=("vimwiki|mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/vimwiki &&  git clone https://github.com/vimwiki/vimwiki.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/vimwiki"
"calendar |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/calendar &&  git clone https://github.com/itchyny/calendar.vim.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/calendar"
"taskwiki|mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/taskwiki &&  git clone https://github.com/tools-life/taskwiki.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/taskwiki --branch dev"
"tabular |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/tabular &&  git clone https://github.com/godlygeek/tabular.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/tabular"
"calendar-vim |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/calendar-vim &&  git clone https://github.com/mattn/calendar-vim.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/calendar-vim"
"tagbar |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/tagbar &&  git clone https://github.com/majutsushi/tagbar /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/tagbar"
"vim-plugin-AnsiEsc |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/vim-plugin-AnsiEsc &&  git clone https://github.com/powerman/vim-plugin-AnsiEsc /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/vim-plugin-AnsiEsc"
"table-mode |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/table-mode &&  git clone https://github.com/dhruvasagar/vim-table-mode.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/table-mode"
"deoplete |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/deoplete &&  git clone https://github.com/Shougo/deoplete.nvim.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/deoplete"
"emmet-vim |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/emmet-vim &&  git clone https://github.com/mattn/emmet-vim.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/emmet-vim"
"ale |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/ale &&  git clone https://github.com/dense-analysis/ale.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/ale"
"HTML5-vim |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/html5-vim &&  git clone https://github.com/othree/html5.vim.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/html5.vim"
"Surround-Vim |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/surround-vim &&  git clone https://github.com/tpope/vim-surround.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/surround-vim"
"Speedread| git clone https://github.com/pasky/speedread.git"
"Shalarm | git clone https://github.com/jahendrie/shalarm.git"
"Vimix-Themes | git clone https://github.com/vinceliuice/vimix-gtk-themes.git"
"Vimix-Icon-Themes |mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/ &&   git clone https://github.com/vinceliuice/vimix-icon-theme.git"
"Vimix-Icons| git clone https://github.com/vinceliuice/Graphite-gtk-theme.git"
"Awsom-Vim-Colo| mkdir /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/awsome-vim-colorschemes &&  git clone https://github.com/rafi/awesome-vim-colorschemes.git /home/batan/.config/nvim/pack/vendor/start/awsome-vim-colorschemes -y")


yad_opts=( --form
           --title="Software Installer"
           --text="Install Software"
           --image="logo.png"
           --button="Install" --button="Exit" )

for m in "${menu[@]}"
do
  yad_opts+=( --field="${m%|*}:CHK" )
done

IFS='|' read -ra ans < <( yad "${yad_opts[@]}" )

for i in "${!ans[@]}"
do
  if [[ ${ans[$i]} == TRUE ]]
  then
    m=${menu[$i]}
    name=${m%|*}
    cmd=${m#*|}
    echo "selected: $name ($cmd)"
    $cmd
  fi
done
